div.h3: The Raymond EASI Narrow Aisle Reach Truck:
div.h5: The Premier Choice for Any Facility
div.p: Raymond Narrow Aisle Reach Trucks are engineered to handle a variety of applications -- whether you're trying to minimize overall footprint and operating costs in your facility, or maximize throughput, A Raymond Reach Truck will exceed your expectations.

div.h5: The Quality Your Business Deserves at a Price You'll Love
div.p: By choosing a used Raymond Reach Truck, you're making the right decision for your facility. Every lift has been tested to ensure its in peak operating condition, and all logbooks have been maintained and kept with the trucks. Making the choice to buy used guarantees you the no-hassle experience you'd expect direct from the manufacturer, complete with savings of up to 60% off the price of new!

div.p: The patented design of Raymond Reach Trucks offers an incredible amount of strength in a tiny package. Ductile Iron Baselegs provide 30% more strength and durability compared to steel alternatives, ensuring reliable load support and enhanced strength and durability. All this while sporting a footprint 40% smaller than that of a standard forklift.

div.p: Raymond Narrow Aisle Reach Trucks are known for maintaining stability at the most dizzying of heights. The Raymond EASI is capable of safely lifting 3,000 lbs. up to 290" (or 4000lbs. up to 250") in the air in spaces as narrow as 6 feet. With those kinds of stats, there isn't a pallet position in your facility thats out of reach.

div.p: Raymond Narrow Aisle Trucks will support any 36V battery between 14" and 21" wide, yielding up to 6 hours of operation off of a single charge. Plus, with trucks charging in under an hour*, you'll experience less downtime and energy costs than ever before.
*Claim assumes battery is charged with charger capable of output up to 965 Ah, actual charge times may vary.
